channel.title: Resumecontents on JL-PORTFOLIO
channel.description: Recent content in Resumecontents on JL-PORTFOLIO

item.title: Courses
item.description: 2024 The Odin Project - Foundational Course Extensive course in event-driven programming and front-end software development. Some of the topics included: version control with git, algorithmic understanding, JavaScript, html and css. 2022 Wwise 301 - Wwise Unity Integration A course which covers the integration between Wwise and Unity and covers all the tools necessary to implement audio and music from Wwise into the Unity game engine. Wwise 201 - Interactive Music A course which covers everything related to implementing dynamic music with Wwise and highly focused on the possibilities and obstacles present when composing in an interactive context.

item.title: Education
item.description: 2021 - 2024 Audio Design | Aarhus University Master of Science (MSc) in Information Technology (Digital Design, Audio Design). 2017 - 2020 Bachelor of Music | The Royal Academy of Music With a focus on audio engineering and production, sound design and contemporary electronic music.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Jun 2024 - present Frontend Developer Project | Part time Web design and development Project Management UX/UI design HTML, CSS, Javascript Versions Control (Git) From design to development of my portfolio website I have gained a lot of knowledge with the general concepts of web frontend development. Aug 2023 - Feb 2024 Technical Sound Designer Company: Gumbo Games (startup) | Part time Developing audiosystems in Unity with C#. Using the version control software tool Git in the development process.
